import React, { Component } from "react" class UserAdmin extends Component{ state={ user:[] } componentDidMount(){ fetch(`http://localhost:4000/users`,{ method:'GET', headers: new Headers({'Content-Type' : 'applications/json','authorization': localStorage.getItem('tok')}) } ) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data=>{ this.setState({ user:data }) }) if (localStorage.getItem('tok') !== 'undefined' && localStorage.getItem('tok') && localStorage.getItem('type') == 'admin') { } else { this.props.history.push('/') } } render(){ return(
{this.state.request.map((request) => ( ))}
User_ID FullName Email Password Contact Qualification City Area
{request.BloodrequestID} {request.BloodTag} {request.Status} {request.Location} {request.Donorcount} {request.Dateofrequest}  
) } } export default UserAdmin
